SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractView
Abstract base class for all user-facing (boundary) views.
ApplicationManager
Controller class to manage student applications and internship placements.
ApprovalManager
Controller class to handle all requests that require staff approval.
AuthManager
Controller class to manage user authentication and registration.
CompanyRepresentative
Entity class representing a Company Representative user.
CompanyView
Boundary class (CLI View) for a logged-in Company Representative.
DataHandler
Utility class for loading and saving application data from/to CSV files.
InputService
Utility class for handling all console input.
InputValidator
Utility class for validating various data formats.
Internship
Entity class for an internship opportunity.
Internship.InternshipLevel
Represents the difficulty level of an internship (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED).
Internship.InternshipStatus
Represents the various states of an internship (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, FULL, CLOSED).
InternshipApplication
Entity class for a student's application to a specific internship.
InternshipApplication.ApplicationStatus
Represents the various states of an application (PENDING, UNSUCCESSFUL, SUCCESSFUL, ACCEPTED, PENDING_WITHDRAWAL, WITHDRAWN).
InternshipManager
Controller class to manage the creation, filtering, and status of internships.
MainMenu
The main boundary class (CLI View) for the application.
Staff
Entity class representing a Staff user.
StaffView
Boundary class (CLI View) for a logged-in Staff member.
Student
Entity class representing a Student user.
StudentView
Boundary class (CLI View) for a logged-in Student.
User
Abstract base class for all users in the system.
